summary: The SDK is explicitly setting a default value for workflowIdReusePolicy, but the server already provides a default. This causes unnecessary duplication and potential inconsistency.
userImpact: Users may experience unexpected behavior due to SDK-level defaults overriding server-level defaults, or confusion about which default applies.
rootCause: The SDK explicitly sets a default value for workflowIdReusePolicy in workflow-options.ts instead of allowing the server to provide the default.
proposedFix: Remove the SDK-level default for workflowIdReusePolicy and allow the server to provide the default value.
resolutionDetails: The SDK-level default was removed to allow the server to handle the default value.
keyQuote: The default is set by the server already.
